Apparatus
   
Full experimental Setup including the venturimeter and the compuetrized measurement system
A closer view of the compressor input

Torque Sensor

 


Specifications (Torque Sensor) Type 4520A
Rated torque N·m 100
Connection shaft
Maximum torque 1,5 x Mnom
Alternating torque 1,5 x Mnom
Accuracy class 0,5
Nominal speed 1/min 8000
Speed measurement 60 pulses/rev.
Operating temperature range °C 10...60
Degree of protection IP40
Signal transmission noncontac

High Sensitivity Ultraminiature Pressure Transducer

 

Specifications (Pressure Transducer) Type XCS-062
Size: Cylindrical Probes
Media: All nonconductive, noncorrosive liquids or gases
Excitation: 10 V
Temperature: -65 to +250°F (-55 to +120°C)
Pressure Range: 0-5 PSI (0 to .35 BAR)
0-15 PSI (0 to 1.0 BAR)
Operational Mode: Absolute
Gage
Sealed Gage
Differential

 

PROCEDURE :


Keep the butterfly valve fully open for the first set of readings. Take readings for different positions of the butterfly valve. Take the readings for various compressor speeds when the butterfly valve is at particular setting.

 

Following reading should be noted


1. Pressure difference across the venture.
2. Static pressure rise across the compressor.
3. Compressor r.p.m. and room temperature.
4. Torque using torque sensor.
